titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of Bilingual Education and Minority Languages Affairs for bilingual education (rescission numbered R87-28) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Rescinds budget authority for the Office of Bilingual Education and Minority Languages Affairs for bilingual education (R87-28).
